description:
You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Unlike most open studio apartments, this studio features a livingroom/bedroom that is separate from the kitchen and bath area.

Travelers will have full access to the studio while they stay.

While I myself will sometimes be available, there will always be a host to meet and greet guests, give them the keys, show them the apartment, and help then any way they can (except for unforeseeable circumstances).

Walking distance to coffee, breakfast, restaurants and much more.

While there is no reserved parking, there are a few parking garages nearby.

Check-in time: After 3pm
Check-out time: 11am
name: Great studio apartment located in midtown east
review: Great experience, very cozy and clean appartment close to everything!!!
